name: NBCUniversal International
bossPosition: Head of Government and Regulatory Affairs
goal: NBCUniversal International is a company active in the production and distribution of film and television content internationally. It is a part of Comcast Corporation, which is itself based in the US.
interests: Competition, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: Intellectual property, culture and media policy, along with general corporate regulation issues.
